name: BipBop: Save the pilot !
description:
Save the pilot before the ship explodes!

In a distant future from now, a ship is taken under unknown fire, that completely wrecks the ship... Fortunately, most of the crew took emergency shuttles to escape but the pilot wants to sink with his ship and that's where you shine! You're mission is to swiftly recover the pilot and escape with him but to do that you'll have to find your way through the wrecked ship as fast as possible.

You can die and retry from checkpoint until the time runs out, but once it does, it's over !

Controls (AZERTY) :

  • Q : Going to the left
  • D : Going to the right
  • Space : Jump
  • E : Interact
  • Z : Go up (zero-gravity only)
  • S : Go down (jump and zero-gravity only)
